name: duty_csv_v1.4.0
summary: Uses a python script to search for files required for Dry Lab transfer, creates a CSV file with URL links for the files and sends an email to MokaGuys

inputSpec.name: project_name
inputSpec.label: DNAnexus project name
inputSpec.help: Name of the DNAnexus project name to generate the CSV file for

inputSpec.name: tso_pannumbers
inputSpec.label: TSO pan numbers
inputSpec.help: Comma separated string. These are used by the app to define Synnovis TSO pan numbers (we only need to download Synnovis pan numbers to the GSTT network)

inputSpec.name: stg_pannumbers
inputSpec.label: St George's pan numbers
inputSpec.help: Comma separated string. These are used by the app to determine which files need to be downloaded to the St George's area and which need to be downloaded to the Synnovis area

inputSpec.name: cp_capture_pannos
inputSpec.label: Synnovis Custom Panels whole capture pan numbers
inputSpec.help: Comma separated string. These are used by the app to determine which files need to be downloaded to both the St George's area and the Synnovis area

inputSpec.name: testing
inputSpec.label: Test mode flag
inputSpec.help: Set as true if you are running this app in test mode - it generates test-specific download paths

outputSpec.name: html
outputSpec.label: Email html
outputSpec.help: HTML file used for email message

outputSpec.name: txt
outputSpec.label: Chrome downloads txt file
outputSpec.help: TXT file containing the chrome downloads commands
